column3: str
My apologies, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>miss<Else/>sir</If>, but we're not able to accept new clientele at present.
It does not appear you have any retainers in your employ at this time.
You cannot perform this action until you have purchased the services of an additional retainer.
Ah, <Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>. Welcome to Musica Universalis. How may I help you?
May I have the name of a retainer you wish to dispatch? The Crystal Exarch has asked that Feo Ul serve as their intermediary. How they would accomplish this, well... I thought it better not to ask.
Send <Clickable(<Highlight>StringParameter(1)</Highlight>)/> to the Crystarium?
Very good. I will see to it Feo Ul contact them right away.
I do believe that retainer has already been dispatched to the Crystarium.
The retainer was unable to meet with Feo Ul.
What would you like to do?
Dispatch a retainer to the Crystarium.
Ask about the Crystarium market.
View market tax rates.
Nothing.
The Crystarium's market is by no means large, but you're more than welcome to sell your wares here.
The Crystal Exarch tells me Feo Ul has been charged with retrieving your things, from...where are you from again, exactly?
Current Market Tax Rates:
<Sheet(Town,IntegerParameter(1),0)/>: Reduced
<Sheet(Town,IntegerParameter(1),0)/>: Normal
Learn about Market Tax
Return
Tax on items sold in the <Sheet(Town,IntegerParameter(1),0)/> markets is the normal rate of <Value>IntegerParameter(2)</Value>%.

Tax on items sold in the <Sheet(Town,IntegerParameter(1),0)/> markets is reduced to <Value>IntegerParameter(4)</Value>% until <Time(IntegerParameter(2))/><If(Equal(PlayerParameter(77),3))> <Value>TopLevelParameter(219)</Value>/<Value>TopLevelParameter(221)</Value>/<Value>TopLevelParameter(222)</Value><Else/><Value>TopLevelParameter(221)</Value>/<Value>TopLevelParameter(219)</Value>/<Value>TopLevelParameter(222)</Value></If> (Earth date).
To make their markets more attractive to prospective sellers, cities will often lower the percentage of tax that is collected from each sale.
Reduced tax rate periods can end earlier than indicated if areas require maintenance.
